snippet.title: Commander of Battlefront Development Demo Version New trailer 【Indie Game】
snippet.description:
Commander of Battlefront is a game I am currently developing personally.
I have a new development demo version ready for release on January 4, 2025 on Booth.
Eventually I plan to release it on Steam and home consoles, but it will take many more years to complete.

Please follow the development by following my Twitter and YouTube channels!
 
Developer : https://x.com/YashiromoriYuki
https://bsky.app/profile/yashiromoriyuki.bsky.social
BOOTH URL : https://yashiromoriyuki.booth.pm/


The world and graphics are tentative and will be changed when the game is released on Steam.
The game title is tentative and may change in the future.
This may be incorrect as it is machine translated.

#indiegame #indiedev #gamedev
